bibl.title: Dedication of a Statue for the Egyptian God Tithoes.
bibl.note: A new edition of: I.G.R. I, 1185 = S.B. I, 305 = I. Portes 82. Midway between Coptos and Apollonopolis Parva, 15-24 Apr. 210 p. Re-discovered in a storeroom at Cornell University, Department of Classics, no Inv. No.
bibl.seg: DIMITROVA Nora and Kevin CLINTON, Dedication of a Statue for the Egyptian God Tithoes.

A new edition of: I.G.R. I, 1185 = S.B. I, 305 = I. Portes 82. Midway between Coptos and Apollonopolis Parva, 15-24 Apr. 210 p. Re-discovered in a storeroom at Cornell University, Department of Classics, no Inv. No.
